Ros Business Consulting

RBC video player
The RBC Group operates on the mass media (an information agency, business television channel RBC TV, online newspapers, and marketing communications) and IT (RBC SOFT) markets.
Watch project

The company want to refuse from commercial plugin with annual payment. Need to find a solution for build new video player with feature:

  • pre/post roll advertising
  • VAST ad
  • streaming HLS (online stream)
  • read file with .m3u8
  • quality changing menu
  • all modern browsers (ie10+)
  • all mobile & tablet browsers (android 4.4+, iOs7+)
  • fullScreen
  • include player in different place on site, in topline in small area & popup, also 2 view in content area in infinite scrolling
  • to apply this solution for all projects of company rbc.ru, tv.rbc.ru, rbc.ru/newspaper, www.rbc.ru/magazine, quote.rbc.ru, autonews.ru, sport.rbc.ru, realty.rbc.ru ...
